pkgmetadata.longdescription: Marginal Survival Estimation with Covariate Adjustment // Provides an efficient and robust implementation for estimating marginal Hazard Ratio (HR) and Restricted Mean Survival Time (RMST) with covariate adjustment using Daniel et al. (2021) doi:10.1002/bimj.201900297 and Karrison et al. (2018) doi:10.1177/1740774518759281.
